articles.title: South Africa: North West Parents Urged to Immunise Children Against Measles - AllAfrica - Top Africa News
articles.description: North West Health MEC, Madoda Sambatha, has urged parents and caregivers to take their children for immunisation against measles at their nearest healthcare facilities.
articles.content:

articles.title: NASA hasn't heard from its InSight lander in 5 days. It may have run out of power and died on Mars. - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: InSight revealed Mars's deep interior to scientists for the first time by capturing more than 1,300 Mars quakes. But the lander was struggling.
articles.content:
NASA suspects its $813 million InSight lander has succumbed to dust on the surface of the red planet, ending its four-year mission of listening to Mars quakes, dust devils, and meteor impacts.

articles.title: SAA recovering some of the R1 billion in funds blocked in Zimbabwe, Nigeria | Business - News24
articles.description: South African Airways still has about US$67 million (about R1.1 billion) in blocked funds owed to it, mainly in Zimbabwe and Nigeria.
